column5: My nine year old woke up this morning and told me that he wanted to catch some of the WGSF (rock bass). So we headed out a little later than usual, the sun was already high, so I  was not expecting much action today.  After 5 tiny WGSF or so he got a little bored and said that he wanted to catch some bass.  3 lb on the digital scale   2.5 lb   He still out fished me, I guess I should listen to him more often  Jose
good for him, Good job little buddy.  My 8yr old out fished me the other day 5 small mouth, my 4yr old got 2 and i got 2... oh and my wife got 3,  what a good day out.
Love the look on his face.  He's thinking to himself 'I beat my Daad. Gotta buy me ice cream now'
Please give him a big pat on the back and congrats from me.   Love to see the little ones out fish us
THat's the way it's supposed to be, right? Worth it all to see a smile like that.  Mike
